analysis.description:
Linfinity.startDate (/unique_chucks/31/0x1581936a08d79f10f323e5a948094055936d4685.sol#125) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/31/0x1581936a08d79f10f323e5a948094055936d4685.sol#233-246)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/31/0x1581936a08d79f10f323e5a948094055936d4685.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/31/0x1581936a08d79f10f323e5a948094055936d4685.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/31/0x1581936a08d79f10f323e5a948094055936d4685.sol#102-103) is not in mixedCase
